name: Legends of Maelm

screenshots.caption: Showing a basic map and some entities.

short_description:
Legends of Maelm aims to play like the classic singleplayer adventure games like Zelda while introducing new gameplay elements.  The world will be entirely continuous.

The game is being programmed in C# using the Mono compiler for cross-platform support, with the OpenTK library for graphics, sound, and input, and the Jitter physics library.
summary: Legends of Maelm is a singleplayer action-adventure game.
